content:
# It seems that I encountered an error again while trying to insert additional Coal into the Stone Furnace, indicating that I no longer have any Coal left in my inventory. 
# This contradicts the previous reports where it showed that I had 27 units of Coal in the furnace.

# To resolve this, I will check my current inventory one more time to confirm the available resources.
current_inventory = inspect_inventory()  # Inspect the current inventory.
print(f"Current Inventory: {current_inventory}")  # Display the current inventory to verify items again.

# If I indeed have no Coal, I will need to harvest more from a nearby Coal resource patch to ensure the Stone Furnace can operate effectively.
# Let's locate the nearest Coal patch again and harvest more Coal if necessary. 
nearest_coal_patch = nearest(Resource.Coal)  # Get the position of the nearest Coal patch.
move_to(nearest_coal_patch)  # Move to that position to harvest Coal.
